means: 少数民族的集中住宅区

sentence.Network_en: Three-fourths of the apartments in the ghetto had no heat.
sentence.Network_cn: 贫民区有3/4的公寓没有暖气。

sentence.Network_en: a poor kid growing up in the ghetto
sentence.Network_cn: 在贫民区长大的穷孩子

sentence.Network_en: One of the most atmospheric corners of Prague is the old Jewish ghetto.
sentence.Network_cn: 古老的犹太人社区是布拉格最具特色的角落之一。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 美国极贫人口创历史新高占十五分之一-英语点津 ... underscore: 强调 ghetto: 贫民区 charge: 被照顾的人（或事物）.
5．h出现在词首，在字母g，r，ex之后。如：ghetto（犹太人居住区），ghost，ghoul（盗尸的人）；rhetoric（修辞学），rhyme，rhythm；exha.
比贫民窟(ghetto)好些。霓虹灯与之对照，形成强烈的对比，它代表资本主义的文明也代表其糜烂的物质享受。
意大利：威尼斯月份平均气温查询 - 威尼斯天气 ... 威尼斯钟楼 companile 犹太人区 ghetto 圣扎卡里亚教堂 sanzaccaria.

list.abs: 《怒火街头》（英文：Ghetto Justice），香港电视广播有限公司时装查案电视剧，由郑嘉颖、胡杏儿、滕丽名、李璨琛、关礼杰及陈 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: perhaps from Italian getto 'foundry' (because the first ghetto was established in 1516 on the site of a foundry in Venice), or from Italian borghetto, diminutive of borgo 'borough'

entry.tran: 贫民区；（相同种族、宗教或国籍的人的）聚居区
entry.def: A ghetto is a part of a city in which many poor people or many people of a particular race, religion, or nationality live separately from everyone else.

example.ex: ...the black ghettos of New York and Los Angeles.
example.tran: 纽约和洛杉矶的黑人聚居区

example.ex: ...the gang kids who will never escape the ghetto.
example.tran: 永远无法走出贫民区的帮派少年

means.word_mean: 1. formerly the restricted quarter of many European cities in which Jews were required to live;
2. any segregated mode of living or working that results from bias or stereotyping;

sentences.sentence: "the relative security of the gay ghetto"
"no escape from the ghetto of the typing pool"

means.word_mean: 3. a poor densely populated city district occupied by a minority ethnic group linked together by economic hardship and social restrictions

sentences.en: Large cities like New York have many ghettos.
sentences.cn: 像纽约那样的大城市有很多贫民区。
